title: Care Management for Patients With Alzheimer Disease and Their Family Caregivers
text:
Summary: This is a clinical trial to test the effectiveness of current guideline for the care of older adults with Alzheimer's disease. The study focuses on the primary care setting using a nurse care manager to facilitate guideline-level care. We are hypothesizing that patients who receive guideline-level care will have fewer behavioral problems than those who receive the usual care provided in primary care settings
Inclusion criteria: inclusion criteria: 

 Alzheimers Disease 

 
Exclusion criteria: : 

 Inability to understand English 

 No telephone

metadata.brief_title: Care Management for Patients With Alzheimer Disease and Their Family Caregivers
metadata.exclusion_criteria:
: 

 Inability to understand English 

 No telephone
